name: grocergen
short_description:
GrocerGen is a general grocery goods inventory tracking and grocery list generation tool. Currently, the tool allows you to create master lists of ingredients, create meals, and, by mapping ingredients to locations in grocery stores, allow to autogenerate grocery lists that reduce your time wandering the store.

In the near future, we hope to incorporate a mobile app that allows your to carry your generated grocery list around on your phone as well as feed updated grocery data back to the main app (such as item locations and store layouts).
summary: A general grocery inventory tracking and shopping list generator tool
